LanguageData.RD_AIPersonaCore.label: AI persona core
LanguageData.RD_AIPersonaCore.description: A hyper-advanced computer core that houses a superhumanlike artificial intelligence. In its isolated state, the core is dormant. Installed in a proper support structure, however, it can become a mind of frightening power.
LanguageData.RD_OsirisAI.label: osiris AI
LanguageData.RD_OsirisAI.description: A special AI construct that directs GilterWorld Osiris caskets as they bring back the dead.
LanguageData.RD_ExoticMatter.label: exotic matter
LanguageData.RD_ExoticMatter.description: The negative mass of this material allows for faster than light travel via the Alcubierre warp method, and is also used to control artificial wormholes Packed in a handy, slightly heavier, container allowing storage on the floor!
